dataSources.name: RiskPremium
dataSources.sqlString: select convert(VARCHAR(10),price_date,101) as date, dp1 as dp, spread as marketSpread, expected_loss as expectedLossSpread from macro..expected_loss order by price_date

dataSources.name: TestUserName
dataSources.sqlString: select * from user_admin..user_login; select * from user_admin..user_login where user_id < {1} and ldap_user_name like '%{2}%'
